name: [24/7] Noob to Second class Macro
short_description:
First of all like to thank: Vedro, Manticora, AmstaFF
It is based on their code.
This macro contains the leveling in noobzone to the first prof and the subsequent level up to 40-50 Job. In the future planing to make a macro to pass quests second prof, loading configuration for different episodes, etc.

At the moment, the macro is fully configured and implemented for oldraggame.ru and includes:

1) Passage noob zone and taking any first prof.
2) Fully automated builds leveling Thief-Assasin, Thief-Rogue 40-50 Jobe + AssasinQuest
3) Storage of all the cards and equipment needed to Kafra while leveling.

Rev41 added:
1.Changes for renewal
2.Work macro for AssasinQuest
